title: ARAM: Bug with vlads health
body:
Ive noticed that twice recently when I've gotten my hands on Vlad in ARAM, my health at the beginning of the game and also whenever i respawn is slightly below full. At a guess id say its probably by about the amount of health his passive would give him, because it gets slightly bigger as the game goes on. I thought it might have been from running health seals on my rune page or something, but I've used a different rune page with armour seals on the second game and still had the same issue.

Just thought i should let you guys know, cheers
